word_mean: 兴奋剂，刺激物：可促使生命或脑功能兴奋的药物

sentence.Network_en: He has been barred from playing for one year because of his using excitant.

sentence.Network_en: Allicin, efficiency element of garlic, has strong excitant smell taste.

sentence.Network_en: Sexual division often suggests to use an illusion to come excitant reaction.
